text: Ara musa yakhana amadera nirdharita samaye upasthita halena ebam tara raba tara sathe katha balalena [1], takhana tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake darsana dana karuna, ami apanake dekhaba’. Tini balalena, ‘apani amake dekhate pabena na [2]. Apani baram paharera dike'i takiye dekhuna [3], seta yadi nijera jayagaya sthira thake tabe apani amake dekhate pabena.’ Yakhana tamra raba pahare jauti prakasa karalena [4] takhana ta paharake curna-bicurna karala ebam musa sanjnahina haye paralena [5]. Yakhana tini jnana phire pelena takhana balalena, ‘mahimamaya apani, ami anutapta haye apanara kache ta'obah‌ karachi ebam muminadera madhye ami'i prathama.’
